stimulus:
You are beginning a two-day experiment

This experiment has two stages which you will complete in separate HITs. The total base payment for both hits is $1.75, plus a performance-dependent bonus of up to $3.50 ($2.50 is a typical bonus).

Stage 1 takes about 15 minutes, and you will receive $0.75 when you complete it. You will complete Stage 2 in a second HIT. You can begin the second HIT between 2:34 PM and 4:34 PM. If you do not begin the HIT within this time frame, you will not receive the second base payment or any bonus.

Upon completing Stage 2, you will receive $1.00 plus your bonus of up to $3.50.
By completing both stages, you can make up to $5.25.

Only continue if you can complete the second (~10 minute) HIT which which will be available between 2:34 PM and 4:34 PM.
